panels.title: Overview (updates based on top time selection)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT sum(requests) as requests
    , sum(case when action_fixed = 'ALLOW' then requests else 0 end) as allow_requests
		, sum(case when action_fixed = 'BLOCK' then requests else 0 end) as block_requests
    , count(distinct clientip) as vistors
FROM "$__table"
WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
    AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
    AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring}) 
    AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
    AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
    AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
    AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
    AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))

SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
    , sum(case when action_fixed = 'ALLOW' then requests else 0 end) as allow_requests
    , sum(case when action_fixed = 'BLOCK' then requests else 0 end) as block_requests
    , sum(case when action_fixed = 'COUNT' then requests else 0 end) as count_requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
    AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
    AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring}) 
    AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
    AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
    AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
    AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
    AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
      OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}')

SELECT webaclname, terminatingruleid, httpsourceid, httpmethod, action_fixed as action, country, sum(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
    AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
    AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring}) 
    AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
    AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
    AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
    AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
    AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY webaclname, terminatingruleid, httpsourceid, httpmethod, action_fixed, country

SELECT label, type, requests
FROM (
    SELECT host as label, 'Host' as type, sum(requests) as requests, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY SUM("requests") DESC) AS rn
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY host
    UNION ALL
    SELECT uri as label, 'URI' as type, sum(requests) as requests, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY SUM("requests") DESC) AS rn
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY uri
    UNION ALL
    SELECT clientip as label, 'ClientIp' as type, sum(requests) as requests, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY SUM("requests") DESC) AS rn
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY clientip
    UNION ALL
    SELECT country as label, 'Country' as type, sum(requests) as requests, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY SUM("requests") DESC) AS rn
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY country
    UNION ALL
    SELECT label as label, 'Label' as type, sum(requests) as requests, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY SUM("requests") DESC) AS rn
    FROM "$__table"
        CROSS JOIN UNNEST(labels) AS t(label)
    WHERE account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    GROUP BY label
) t
WHERE t.rn <= 100;

panels.description: A label is metadata added to a web request by a matching rule.
panels.title: Top 100 Labels

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT rulegroupid
    , terminatingrule.ruleid
    , terminatingrule.action
    , count(1) as cn
FROM (
    SELECT
        "rulegroup"."rulegroupid", 
        "rulegroup"."terminatingrule"
    FROM "$__table"
        CROSS JOIN UNNEST(rulegrouplist) AS t(rulegroup)
    WHERE "rulegroup"."terminatingrule" is not null
        AND account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
) t
GROUP BY rulegroupid, terminatingrule.ruleid, terminatingrule.action
ORDER BY cn DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT 
    rg.rulegroupid,
    rules.ruleid,
    rules.action,
    count(1) as cn
FROM (
    SELECT
        "rulegroup"."rulegroupid", 
        "rulegroup"."nonterminatingmatchingrules"
    FROM "$__table"
        CROSS JOIN UNNEST(rulegrouplist) AS t(rulegroup)
    WHERE "rulegroup"."nonterminatingmatchingrules" != ARRAY[]
        AND account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))) rg
        CROSS JOIN UNNEST(nonterminatingmatchingrules) AS t(rules)
GROUP BY rg.rulegroupid, rules.ruleid, rules.action
ORDER BY cn DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT "timestamp"
    , "webaclname"
    , rulegroupid
    , ruleid
    , action
    , rulematchdetails
    , isterminatingrule
    , country
    , clientip
    , uri
    , host
FROM (
    SELECT
        "timestamp",
        "webaclname",
        "rulegroup"."rulegroupid", 
        "rulegroup"."terminatingrule"."ruleid", 
        "rulegroup"."terminatingrule"."action", 
        "rulegroup"."terminatingrule"."rulematchdetails",
        'Y' as isterminatingrule,
        "country", 
        "clientip", 
        "uri", 
        "host"
    FROM "$__table"
        CROSS JOIN UNNEST(rulegrouplist) AS t(rulegroup)
    WHERE "rulegroup"."terminatingrule" is not null
        AND account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
        AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
        AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
        AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
        AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
        AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
        AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        "timestamp",
        "webaclname",
        rg.rulegroupid,
        rules.ruleid,
        rules.action,
        rules.rulematchdetails,
        'N' as isterminatingrule,
        country, 
        clientip, 
        uri, 
        host
    FROM (
        SELECT
            "timestamp",
            "webaclname",
            "rulegroup"."rulegroupid", 
            "rulegroup"."nonterminatingmatchingrules",
            "country", 
            "clientip", 
            "uri", 
            "host"
        FROM "$__table"
            CROSS JOIN UNNEST(rulegrouplist) AS t(rulegroup)
        WHERE "rulegroup"."nonterminatingmatchingrules" != ARRAY[]
            AND account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
            AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
            AND action_fixed IN (${action:sqlstring})
            AND terminatingruletype IN (${terminatingruletype:sqlstring})
            AND webaclname IN (${webaclname:sqlstring})
            AND terminatingruleid IN (${terminatingruleid:sqlstring})
            AND clientip LIKE '${clientip}%'
            AND uri LIKE '${uri}%'
            AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
            AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
                OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
        ) rg
            CROSS JOIN UNNEST(nonterminatingmatchingrules) AS t(rules)
) t
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 500;

list.allValue: SELECT account_id FROM "$__table"  WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH') 	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00') GROUP BY account_id
list.label: Account Id
list.name: account_id

query.rawSQL:
SELECT account_id
FROM "$__table" 
WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY account_id

FROM "$__table"

		OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY webaclname

FROM "$__table"
WHERE  account_id IN (${account_id:sqlstring})
	AND region IN (${region:sqlstring})
	AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
		OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
